Comment: A unique one letter ID code for the Job Status.
A descriptive name for the status.
If this field contains 'Y', the status prevents entry of new transactions.
If this field contains 'Y', the status makes the job read-only.
If this field contains 'Y', the status causes the job to be archived.
If this field contains 'Y', the status causes the job to be marked as Complete.
If this field contains 'Y', the status causes the job to be marked as Active.
If this field contains 'Y', the status causes the job to be marked as Ready for Invoice.
If this field contains 'Y', the status causes quotations on the job to be read-only.
If this field contains 'Y', workflow constraints (defined in the JOB_STATUS_CONSTRAINT table) apply to the status.
A colour code that determines how jobs of this status should appear on the diagram on the Job Overview tab.
